org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class GameCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.GameCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class GameCodec
extends AutomatonCodec
    An GameCodec can encode a game in GOAL file format (GFF) and decode a GFF file back to a game. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
